text: Erik Prekop (born 8 October 1997) is a Slovak football forward who currently plays for FC Hradec Králové. He was previously loaned to lower division teams. ==Club career== ===AS Trenčín=== Prekop made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for AS Trenčín against Zemplín Michalovce on 16 July 2016. Trenčín lost the away game 2:1. Prekop came on in the 65th minute, replacing Denis Jančo.MFK Zemplín Michalovce - AS Trenčín 2:1 (1:0) 16.07.2016, futbalnet.sk ==References== ==External links== * AS Trenčín official club profile * Fortuna Liga profile * * Eurofotbal profile * Futbalnet profile Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:AS Trenčín players Category:FK Inter Bratislava players Category:FC Petržalka players Category:FC Hradec Králové players Category:Expatriate footballers in the Czech Republic Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:Sportspeople from Trenčín
title: Erik Prekop
